alert.note: Alert for Cerro Gordo; Franklin; Hancock; Humboldt; Kossuth; Palo Alto; Pocahontas; Wright (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 23 at 4:03AM CDT until March 23 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...Light to Moderate Snow Continues Across Northern Iowa Early This Morning... .Light to moderate snow is expected to wane across northern Iowa during the early morning hours. Additional light accumulations under an inch are expected with slightly less amounts on roads due to initial melting. The snow may be heavy at times as well with reduced visibilities. Roads may be slick and snow covered. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 3 inches on vegetation, slightly less on roads. Locally higher amounts possible. * WHERE...Portions of northern Iowa. * WHEN...Until 7 AM CDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest travel conditions, check the Iowa 511 app, www.511ia.org, or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Cerro Gordo; Franklin; Hancock; Humboldt; Kossuth; Palo Alto; Pocahontas; Wright
